summary: Completed comprehensive PRD analysis of ALL 62 repositories in the Dadudekc workspace. Found 22 repositories with PRDs (35.5%) and 40 repositories without PRDs (64.5%). Identified significant documentation gaps requiring immediate attention.
next_steps: Phase 1: Create PRDs for 10 highest-priority repositories
Phase 3: Review and standardize all PRDs
blockers: None identified - ready to proceed with PRD creation
recommendations: Implement consistent PRD template across all repositories
Focus on high-impact AI/ML and trading projects first
Establish PRD maintenance and update workflow
Consider automated PRD generation for simple projects
